neutral: ^The greatest adventure is what lies ahead.
Req2: ^Okay, the house is clear, you have your companions. Please tell me that’s it.
^I found it is the small everyday deeds of ordinary folk that keep the darkness at bay.
^And I see the moral of these words before my very eyes.
^!! (I can use these for the ship!)
^May the wind under your wings bear you where the sun sails and the moon walks.
yes: ^Hey Gandalf. Your LARP going well or…?
^Be it companions or location, our world is incomplete.
^But do not fret and do not weep. Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
no: ^All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us.
^I was talking aloud to myself. A habit of the old.
^I am Gandalf the Grey and I am presently Live Action Role Playing.
^A wizard is never late, nor is he early, he arrives precisely when he means to. But even the very wise cannot see all ends.
^My humble abode, invaded by some creature who misunderstands the old. Approach with caution and stealth.
